snippet: The Justice and Education Departments said schools “may be in violation of federal law” if they turn children away because they or their parents do not have immigration papers.
abstract: Attorney General Eric H Holder Jr and Education Secretary Arne Duncan issue strong warning to public school districts nationwide not to deny enrollment to immigrant students in country illegally.
lead_paragraph: The Justice and Education Departments said schools “may be in violation of federal law” if they turn children away because they or their parents do not have immigration papers.

headline.main: Districts Told Not to Deny Students Over Immigration
headline.print_headline: Districts Told Not to Deny Students Over Immigration
